mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, password, nick, name, email, gender, answer, member_level, register_date, love) values(#{id}, #{password},#{nick}, #{name}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{answer}, 1, sysdate, 0 )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id=#{value}
select * from member where member_id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_id=#{id} and password=#{password}
